info.title: group.one Centralized License Service API
info.description:
Multi-tenant, multi-brand license management system API.

All API requests support the `X-Correlation-ID` header for request tracing. If not provided, one will be generated and returned in the response.

post.description: Activate a license key for a specific instance type and value. Seat management is based on unique instance values per type.

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: Optional correlation ID for request tracing

license_key.description: The license key to activate (5 groups of 5 characters)

product_slug.description: The product slug for this activation (machine-friendly identifier)

instance_type.description: Type of instance identifier for seat management

instance_value.description: Value of the instance identifier (e.g., the actual URL, hostname, or machine ID)

400.description: Activation failed - Invalid key, expired, or max seats reached for instance type

message.example: Maximum activations reached for instance type: site_url

post.description: Deactivate an active license activation, freeing up an activation slot

get.description: Check the activation status of a license key for a specific product. Returns seat usage per instance type.

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: Optional correlation ID for request tracing

parameters.name: license_key
parameters.description: The license key to check (5 groups of 5 characters)

parameters.name: product_slug
parameters.description: The product slug to check status for (machine-friendly identifier)

post.description: Create a new API key for the authenticated user's brand. The full key is only returned once upon creation.

name.description: A descriptive name for the API key

key.description: The full API key - only shown once

post.summary: Register a new user and brand
post.description: Register a new user account along with a new brand. Returns user details, brand info, and an initial API key.

api_key.description: Initial API key for the brand

post.description: Authenticate a user and receive a Sanctum Bearer token for account management operations.
Invalidate the current user's authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve all licenses and license keys for a customer by email address. Provides a complete summary of the customer's license entitlements.

license_keys.description: All license keys belonging to the customer

post.description: Create a new license for a customer. If no license key exists for the customer email, one will be generated.

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: Optional correlation ID for request tracing

max_activations_per_instance.description: Maximum seats (unique values) per instance type for seat management. Keys are instance types (site_url, host, machine_id), values are the max number of unique values allowed.

license_key.description: Only returned when a new license key is generated

post.description: Extend the expiration date of a license. Only applicable to subscription and trial licenses.

422.description: License cannot be renewed (e.g., perpetual license)

post.description: Temporarily suspend a license. Suspended licenses cannot be used for activations.

422.description: License is already suspended or cancelled

post.description: Permanently cancel a license. This action cannot be undone. All active activations will be deactivated.

get.summary: Get a license key by key string
get.description: Retrieve full details of a license key by its key string (5 groups of 5 characters). Includes status, entitlements, associated licenses, and remaining activation slots per instance.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The license key string (5 groups of 5 characters)

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: Optional correlation ID for request tracing

entitlements.description: Activation limits and usage per product and instance type

max_activations_per_instance.description: Maximum seats (unique values) allowed per instance type for seat management

LicenseKey.title: License Key
LicenseKey.description: License key model - keys are formatted as 5 groups of 5 characters

key.description: License key in 5 groups of 5 characters

max_activations_per_instance.description: Maximum seats (unique values) allowed per instance type for seat management

Activation.title: Activation
Activation.description: License activation model - activations are tied to specific instance types and values for seat management

instance_type.description: Type of instance identifier for seat management

SanctumAuth.description: Laravel Sanctum Bearer token obtained from /v1/auth/login

ApiKeyHeader.description: API key for authentication via header
ApiKeyHeader.name: X-API-Key
